text: let me tell you something
this is an elementary school this is
hard work long hours
high pressure i need a grown goddamn man
you give me this and i will work as hard
as it takes to school those harvard
douches and become the best lawyer you
have ever seen
i told you i like to read and once i
read something i understand it and once
i understand it
i never forget it
what if i told you that i consumed
knowledge like no one you've ever met
and i've actually passed the bar
i'd say you're full of crap
you know damn well they're gonna uncover
a secret i don't know that
and you don't either yeah i do no one's
ever found it before
get out
[Music]
so i'd say the ball's in your court but
the truth is your balls are in my fist
i hear someone's not taking their pills
that's his word against mine
doesn't matter any way you slice it
i'm gonna bleed you dry
maybe hardman wanted me dead but you're
the one who went out
got the gun aimed it and fired it at my
head and it blew up in my face
and what would have happened if it
didn't i don't play the odds
i play the man
[Music]
do
you
